Homewood suites are great,lovely large clean rooms, clean towels every day, free breakfast every day, free coffee all day, free beer, wine and snacks monday to thursday, many restaurants within walking distance, universal 5 mins away in car, pool area lovely with free towels. Would book this hotel again without a doubt for my next (hopefully very soon) trip to Florida, the best holiday you can have!

Reviews.Title: “good value”
Reviews.Author: fiona229
Reviews.Content: Stayed over New Year. very nice and clean with spacious suites. Plenty of room for our family of four. Good breakfasts. the food at the evening reception was a bit more hit and miss but lots of families seemed to love it. Close to lots of restaurants - within walking distance. Nice clean swimming pool and jacuzzi. Very good for families.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel ! Great location !”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Having been to Orlando on a number of occasions and having previously stayed at typical chain-type budget hotels that cost around £30 to £40 a night, we saw the positive reviews on Trip Advisor for this hotel and found this hotel on one of the hotel booking websites at a price marginally higher than what we had previously paid for budget hotels. So we decided to give this hotel a try - we are glad we did. This hotel has so much more to offer. The rooms are split into two (bedroom and sitting room/kitchen) which means more space to spread out your belongings (and gifts!)and gives it more of a homely feel than your typical cheap hotel. The hotel has a very safe feel about it as well as all doors open into an internal corridor and not out onto a walkway outside. The security is very good and mean that no-one can just walk in off the street easily. The breakfast is great and you are spoilt for choice between healthy fruit or pastries or a good old fry-up. The staff are really welcoming and the rooms are very clean. The internet room is free to use for all residents and we found it to be reasonably easy to get onto a terminal to catch up on emails or check the weather (we visited just after Wilma so it was really convenient to see what roads and national parks were closed, the fuel situation, etc). Location is great - 10 minutes walk to Wet n Wild and International Drive. We had a car and found this useful to drive down I-Drive to one of the many restaurants or crazy golf courses along the way. Hotel is less than 5 minutes drive to Universal (although could be walked in about 20 minutes) and is within easy reach of SeaWorld (at the other end of I-Drive) or Interstate 4 to get to DisneyWorld (several miles away). In summary we would highly recommend this hotel and will definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Loved It”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Went to Orlando in Sept of this year and this really is the best place to stay. The staff were totally amazing and really eager to help in every way possible. The hotel is clean and breakfast is lovely. The location is fantastic to and to top it all of, they even provide free transport to the nearby theme parks. Trying to book another holiday to Orlando and will definetly be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Have just returned home (Nov 25th) from a great holiday at this hotel. The hotel is immaculately clean, staff are friendly and helpful. The rooms are spacious with everything you could need during your stay: kitchen area (containing dishwasher, microwave, toaster, coffee maker and fridge freezer). The lounge area is of more than adequate size, the bedroom had 2 queen size beds, not to mention large wardrobe and plenty of drawers for storage. The bathroom was clean and spacious. The maid came daily providing clean towells. My family (2 adults and 2 children) fitted comfortably into the apartment. The rest of the hotel was also spotless, modern and comfortable. The breakfast was great, much more than the normal - bacon, sausage and eggs were on the menu daily along with waffles, yoghurts, cereals, toast and pastries. The evening free buffet and drinks deal was also excellent, however we only managed to make it on 3 occasions due to long days at the theme parks. Located just off International Drive is a bonus, very local to just about anything you need and once we got used to the route, very easy to locate. Although only a few minutes walk away from the hustle and bustle but was surprisingly very quiet, we often ate breakfast by the clean pool, and relaxed in the jacuzzi at night with very little noise. Free internet sevice was also a bonus as well as the gym and games room. Definately stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Homewood Universal in September 05. At first having read some of the earlier reviews we were a bit dubious,once we found the hotel, which wasnt very easy even though this was our 3rd time in IDrive,its behind the Sherraton tower, we realised all our worries were for nothing.The hotel was really clean,with good facilities the free breakfast was very nice,plenty of choice,rooms very spacious,we had 2 queen size beds in ours,they were cleaned dialy and towels changed dialy,ample facilities ie microwave,fridge,iron etc etc.Pool area was clean and good for us,it may be a bit on the small size if the hotel gets busy,which i think it must do at some stage,not to busy during our stay.The managers welcome back meeting,with free food and drinks was a nice touch, even though we only managed to make it 3 times as we had so much to do,but nothing new about that. Overall great hotel and really good value for money,the only thing missing was a bar for a relaxing drink in the evening before retiring to bed. Would we use this hotel again,yes and are looking forward to it.

Reviews.Title: “Location Great, Hotel Great, Transportation OK, Overall good to great!”
Reviews.Author: gomary
Reviews.Content: Hotel is walkable distance to Universal Studios, maybe 20 minutes. Shuttles only ran at 8:45 am and 11:45 am so we used a taxi one time. Six people for only $5.25 plus tip. Breakfast was good for free. Eggs, waffles, bacon, sausage, donuts, muffins, cereal. Rooms were clean although one day the housekeeping staff missed two of our three rooms. Employees pleasant enough. Would return again if going to Universal.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it all, see you next Year”
Reviews.Author: postboy
Reviews.Content: Our 8th time in florida .ist time at homewood suites. excellent staff,excellent rooms,excellent pool.excellent b/fast,excellent evening buffet,excellent free beer/wine. what more can we say but Excellent. Excellent.

Reviews.Title: “OK, but not as nice as my previous visit”
Reviews.Author: pinklady08
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel in August 2005 (see previous review) and was pleased enough to stay again in September 2005. While I received help from a knowledgeable staff during this visit, I wasn't as pleased with the rooms. I booked a suite with two queen bed (this is the best way to ensure a large suite!). The hallway to the suite was divided into one half smoking and one-half non-smoking, a lay-out which I had never seen in a Hilton hotel before. This made walking down the hallway a bit uncomfortable, especially for our smoke-sensitive daughter. The room had a musty smell, but it was clean. The sofa, which is a peach color, was noticeably dirty on the arms. The curtains, as well as the carpet, were dusty. It appeared as if no one has stayed in the rooms in months, as the tub had rust around the drain! The breakfast was much nicer than I had remembered. The breakfast included what appeared to be real eggs (!!!), sausage, bacon, Belgian waffles (have to make yourself), mushrooms, onions, tomatoes, olives, doughnuts, croissants, cereal, biscuits, gravy, various juices, coffee, and fruit. The pool is outside with the Jacuzzi. There is also a small basketball court outside. Overall, the stay was tolerable since we spent most of our time at Disney, but the room could use a good dusting and vacuuming. I'm not sure if the housekeeping quality is declining at this hotel, or if this was just a bad room on the 5th floor!

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Stayed here 3rd June 05, Realy good Hotel, 5 Mins from Universal by car. Rooms Big with two Queen size Beds. TV in bedroom and One in lounge area with Fridge, Iron / Ironing board, Ice making machines dotted around corridors, Full American Breakfast, scrambled eggs, cereals, Waffles, Fresh Fruit, Yogurts, Bagals, Toast, Juices. Free happy hour 5-7pm with free Soft Drinks and Alcoholic Drinks and snacks, enough till you go out in the evening, and saves you $$$ and was great. Maid service could have been a bit better. A bit hit and miss. Pool area was great, with Jaccuzi hot tub. Clean with free towels. Free internet access near reception, Basic Games room and Gym. Reception was fine, but did not use the desk much. Crazy golf short walk away as is Wet & Wild & Skull Kingdom. Great, modern, good facilities large rooms food Great, Very quite. 5/5. Would have no hesitation staying here again.

HotelInfo.Name: Homewood Suites Orlando-Nearest to Universal Studios
HotelInfo.Address: 5893 American Way, Orlando, FL 32819
